errors.msg: Invalid pool duration - must be greater than 0

errors.msg: Calculated APR exceeds maximum u64 value

errors.msg: Unauthorized vault - must belong to this project

errors.msg: Invalid withdrawal wallet - does not match stake withdrawal_wallet
errors.name: InvalidWithdrawalWallet

errors.name: InvalidReflectionVault

errors.msg: Invalid project - stake does not belong to this project
errors.name: InvalidProject

errors.msg: Inconsistent total staked - total_staked is less than withdrawal amount
errors.name: InconsistentTotalStaked

errors.msg: Pool has ended - cannot deposit after pool end time
errors.name: PoolEnded

errors.msg: Invalid rate mode - must be 0 (fixed APY) or 1 (variable APR)
errors.name: InvalidRateMode

errors.name: MissingAssociatedTokenProgram

This is where the token contract will automatically send reflections
